Text: Still Reigning is a live performance DVD by the thrash metal band Slayer, released in 2004 through American Recordings.
Triplets:<Still Reigning
1:
--------------------
Text: Still Reigning:  Filmed at the Augusta Civic Center on July 11, 2004, the performance showcases Slayer's 1986 album, "Reign in Blood", played in its entirety with the four original band members on a set resembling their 1986 "Reign in Pain" tour.
Triplets:<Slayer
